tasks:
The '#' (pound sign / hashtag) is used to interpret everything on the same line after it as a comment.

Comments are not treated as executable code by the Python interpreter and may be used to explain your code or what you're trying to accomplish. Put another way, it will help future you not hate past you.

The flag for this challenge is to write as a comment "this is my first comment" (no quotes)

tasks:
Variables are symbolic names to which you want to assign some sort of value.

x = 1 (a single equals sign represents "assignment").
In this example, the value 1 is being assigned to the variable x.
